law.catch_line: Administrative regulations -- Reports to Governor and Legislative Research Commission.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 5, sec. 24, effective February 25, 2010. -- Created 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 139, sec. 25, effective July 15, 2008.

metadata.lrc-note: (2/25/2010). 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 5, sec. 28, provides that the repeal and reenactment of this section in that Act "shall apply retroactively to July 15, 2008."
